result.markdown:
# Using R in VS Code
Although the best R IDE is Posit (formally RStudio), there are still some people willing to try other options. In this document I will briefly describe how to set up R environment in VS Code. The main reference is [the official document](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/r).

## radian

If you use conda to install radian, the path is `<anaconda path>/Scripts/radian.exe`

::: {.cell collapse='true' execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
1+1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1}
```
2
```
:::
:::
